description:
[https://docs.sentry.io/api/projects/list-a-projects-debug-information-files/](https://docs.sentry.io/api/projects/list-a-projects-debug-information-files/)

Retrieve a list of debug information files for a given project.

### Path Parameters

`organization_slug` *(string)*REQUIRED

The slug of the organization the file belongs to.

`project_slug` *(string)*REQUIRED

The slug of the project to list the DIFs of.

### Scopes

You need to [authenticate via bearer auth token.](https://docs.sentry.io/api/auth) requires one of the following scopes:

*   `project:read`
